item.title: Maze Generator à la Shiffman
item.description: I am a big fan of Daniel Shiffman’s work and particularly like his YouTube channel Coding Challenges. One of the “challenges” is the creation of a Maze Generator using p5.js, the JavaScript implementation of the Processing language/package. In this short article you can find my implementation of the Maze Generator à la Shiffman. Run the Maze Generator below or head down to view the code. Maze Generator Hosted on OpenProcessing.
